function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Declaration of a pandemic by WHO","Impact":"Global panic and uncertainty, strain on resources","Mitigation":"Timely and transparent communication, coordinated response","Technologies":"Telemedicine, contact tracing apps","People":"Global population","Owner":"Health authorities, governments, international organizations"},{"Description":"Widespread contagious disease transmission","Impact":"High mortality rate, overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Vaccination, social distancing, travel restrictions","Technologies":"Vaccine development, telehealth, remote monitoring","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare agencies, governments, research institutions"},{"Description":"Rapid spread from animals to humans","Impact":"Uncontrolled transmission, zoonotic infection","Mitigation":"Animal surveillance, public health education, wildlife trade regulation","Technologies":"Gene sequencing, animal tracking devices","People":"Communities in close proximity to wildlife, global population","Owner":"Wildlife conservation organizations, public health authorities"}]}
